attributes.action: Stop the proposed march by Islamuk through Wooten Basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muslim extremist Anjem Choudary has vowed to go ahead with a protest march through Wootton Bassett claiming those who honour the war dead are no different to those who support the 7/7 Tube bombers. THIS MARCH MUST NOT TAKE PLACE PLEASE DEFEND THE MEMORY OF OUR BRAVE TROOPS, ITS OUR DUTY TO TO DEFEND OUR TROOPS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
